memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Diana: "I believe Charlie's investigation. Let's vote Bob out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, that's impossible - there's only one detective and you can't investigate and then claim results publicly like that. You're lying!"
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Alice last night? That would have been the logical first move to protect our detective."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob because he seemed most suspicious. Diana, why are you doubting me instead of helping eliminate the mafia?"
